snippet: Remarks from 1990 in a new book about Ben Bradlee, the former editor of The Washington Post, drew a defense from the reporter Bob Woodward.
abstract: Jeff Himmelman releases authorized biography of Ben Bradlee, the former editor of The Washington Post, entitled Yours in Truth; book includes 1990 quote by Bradlee questioning details in reporter Bob Woodward's account of the Watergate scandal; Woodward responds by noting that Bradlee's comments, which were made long before the identity of his anonymous source was revealed, are outdated.
lead_paragraph: Remarks from 1990 in a new book about Ben Bradlee, the former editor of The Washington Post, drew a defense from the reporter Bob Woodward.

headline.seo: Woodward Responds to Bradlee Watergate Excerpt
headline.main: Biography of Editor Keeps Watergate Twists Coming
headline.print_headline: Biography of Editor Keeps the Watergate Twists Coming
